argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_r1sucg | |- ( A e. dom R1 -> ( R1 ` suc A ) = ~P ( R1 ` A ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_r1fnon | |- R1 Fn On |
| 3 |  | #P_fndm | |- ( R1 Fn On -> dom R1 = On ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_ax-mp | |- dom R1 = On |
| 5 | 4 | #P_eqcomi | |- On = dom R1 |
| 6 | 1, 5 | #P_eleq2s | |- ( A e. On -> ( R1 ` suc A ) = ~P ( R1 ` A ) ) |
